> con't 3) ...exceed maybe

Exceed would be impossible.  I have crashed the game a few times 
because my characters exceeded certain limits of the game.  Let's see. 
 a few times for too high an experience level, another for having too 
much magic power.

I will not specify my tricks for reaching those limits except to say I 
used an archmage to do that.  A cleric probably could also. Any other 
characters would take lots more work to exceed those limits.
